conbody.p: NS receives TCP message from external systems. The message is parsed, and based on the content of the message, specific actions are taken in NS. The TCP/IP interface only supports synchronous mode of communication. NS sends acknowledgement (ACK) back to the client immediately after the message format is verified.
In the IOHO, port 10391 is configured as the default port for receiving TCP/IP notifications for NS. To change the default port, contact Nokia support.
